original_text: And all these your servants shall come down to me and bow down to me, saying, ‘Get out, you and all the people who follow you.’ And after that I will go out.” And he went out from Pharaoh in hot anger.
korean_text: 왕의 이 모든 신하가 내게 내려와 내게 절하며 이르기를 너와 너를 따르는 온 백성은 나가라 한 후에야 내가 나가리라 하고 심히 노하여 바로에게서 나오니라

sentences.original_text: And all these your servants shall come down to me
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이 모든 당신의 종들이 내게 내려올 것이라

sentences.original_text: you and all the people who follow you.'
And after that I will go out.
And he went out from Pharaoh
